name: UpdateAccountingFieldOption
description:
Update a custom accounting field option to reflect changes.

Use this tool to modify a specific custom accounting field option by providing its ID. It updates the metadata or details associated with the field option.

parameters.name: custom_field_option_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the custom accounting field option to be updated. Required for specifying which field option to modify.

parameters.name: custom_field_option_code
parameters.description: Code of the custom accounting field option. Provide an empty string to reset the code. Only available if not using a direct ERP integration.

value_schema.description: Only available if not using a direct ERP integration: Code of the custom accounting field option; you could provide an empty string to reset the code.

parameters.name: update_display_name
parameters.description: Update the display name of the custom field option.

value_schema.description: Available to all: Update the display name of the custom field option.

parameters.name: field_option_name
parameters.description: Name of the custom accounting field option. Only available if not using a direct ERP integration.

value_schema.description: Only available if not using a direct ERP integration: Name of the custom accounting field option.

parameters.name: set_visibility
parameters.description: Set the visibility of the custom field option to 'HIDDEN' or 'VISIBLE'.

value_schema.description: Available to all: Hide or Show option

parameters.name: reactivate_custom_field_option
parameters.description: Set to true to reactivate a deleted custom field option if not using direct ERP integration.

value_schema.description: Only available if not using a direct ERP integration: reactivate a deleted custom field option

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Only available if not using a direct ERP integration: Code of the custom accounting field option; you could provide an empty string to reset the code.

value_schema.description: Only available if not using a direct ERP integration: Code of the custom accounting field option; you could provide an empty string to reset the code.

parameters.name: display_name
parameters.description: Available to all: Update the display name of the custom field option.

value_schema.description: Available to all: Update the display name of the custom field option.

parameters.name: reactivate
parameters.description: Only available if not using a direct ERP integration: reactivate a deleted custom field option

value_schema.description: Only available if not using a direct ERP integration: reactivate a deleted custom field option

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Only available if not using a direct ERP integration: Name of the custom accounting field option.

value_schema.description: Only available if not using a direct ERP integration: Name of the custom accounting field option.

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: Available to all: Hide or Show option

value_schema.description: Available to all: Hide or Show option

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
